name: Heroes of Eroticism - Opportunities of Love
name_original: Heroes of Eroticism - Opportunities of Love
description:
Return to the world of Heroes of Eroticism
Continue your journey from Heroes of Eroticism – Amorous Advances and experience the final 3 episodes of Heroes of Eroticism in this one convenient package. Around 90000 words of excitement, romance and tough choices.

Nearly 2 decades after the pillar of justice – known to the world as the superhero Goldstar – turned his back on everything he once stood for and tried to crown himself Emperor of America, superheroes are once again starting to emerge after having been totally eradicated.

But not all is as simple as it first appeared. Mysterious figures, manipulation and shady corporations start to cast doubt on what you once believed about the day Goldstar died. Shine light on secrets long buried and reveal the truth.

Experiments, injuries and even deaths. Explore the true nature of your superpowers. Discover the man and the strange entities behind their creation before history repeats itself. Some people will just never learn from their mistakes.

Not everything in Liam’s life is doom and gloom though. His relationships with the charming Jane and the determined Alison continue to grow. Many more opportunities for love show themselves and the only thing you need to do is grasp them. Will Liam prove himself their one true love, or will they find love elsewhere?

Willow, Violet, Iris, Avery and Emma are all willing to help you in love and in solving the many mysteries that present themselves to you. But when the mysterious figure known as Whiteshadow comes knocking, will you lead them to safety or to certain doom?

Answers and hidden truths await you both in this final chapter of Liam’s story. Step back into the world of lust and superpowers and help uncover the truth.

Features
- Around 90000 words of superpowers, lust and twists and turns
- Combines episodes 7 through 9 into a single package
- Plenty of meaningful choices to make along the way
- Tons and tons of HD images for you to enjoy
- Beautiful music to listen to the entire journey
- The ability to import save files from Amorous Advances or Episode 6 – The Storm to carry over your choices
- The ability to skip importing any save files and start with the default choices if desired
